p: We believe it important that future studies include the verification of the nutritional status of the subjects before interventions, via the development of screening tests with reliable protocols and indicators, using omics techniques. These indicators should include both PEM and vitamin status, with complete metabolic and transcriptomic panels dedicated to the expected immune response of the intervention [ 18]. This approach should also be used for the microbiome and lipidome and for the assessment of genetic profiles.
